# Format: #/name defines a new extras_require group called name
# Uncommented lines after the group definition insert things into that group.

#/postgres
psycopg2-binary>=2,<3

#/animated_stickers
pillow>=4,<9

#/e2be
asyncpg>=0.20,<0.22
python-olm>=3,<4
pycryptodome>=3,<4
unpaddedbase64>=1,<2

#/metrics
prometheus_client>=0.6,<0.10
